name: litellm (BerriAI)
description: [项目级] Python SDK, Proxy Server (AI Gateway) to call 100+ LLM APIs in OpenAI (or native) format, with cost tracking, guardrails, loadbalancing and logging. [Bedrock, Azure, OpenAI, VertexAI, Cohere, Anthropic, Sagemaker, HuggingFace, VLLM, NVIDIA NIM]。来源: https://github.com/BerriAI/litellm

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Python SDK, Proxy Server (AI Gateway) to call 100+ LLM APIs in OpenAI (or native) format, with cost tracking, guardrails, loadbalancing and logging. [Bedrock, Azure, OpenAI, VertexAI, Cohere, Anthropic, Sagemaker, HuggingFace, VLLM, NVIDIA NIM]

来源: https://github.com/BerriAI/litellm
语言: Python
Stars: 36411

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
git clone https://github.com/BerriAI/litellm.git
cd litellm
make install-dev    # Install development dependencies
make format         # Format your code
make lint           # Run all linting checks
make test-unit      # Run unit tests
make format-check   # Check formatting only

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
AGENTS.md
ARCHITECTURE.md
CLAUDE.md
CONTRIBUTING.md
Dockerfile
GEMINI.md
LICENSE
Makefile
README.md
ci_cd
ci_cd/.grype.yaml
ci_cd/TEST_KEY_PATTERNS.md
ci_cd/baseline_db.py
ci_cd/check_file_length.py
ci_cd/check_files_match.py
ci_cd/publish-proxy-extras.sh
ci_cd/run_migration.py
ci_cd/security_scans.sh
ci_cd/security_scans_readme.md
codecov.yaml

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
You can use LiteLLM through either the Proxy Server or Python SDK. Both gives you a unified interface to access multiple LLMs (100+ LLMs). Choose the option that best fits your needs:
LiteLLM AI Gateway LiteLLM Python SDK
Use Case
